product_overview: NestTask is an integrated task and academic management platform designed for students and educators, offering tools to effectively organize daily routines, manage assignments, handle study materials, and monitor academic progress through a unified web and mobile experience.
core_goals: Provide secure user authentication with role-based access control for Users, Admins, and Super Admins.
Enable comprehensive task management including creation, categorization, status tracking, and intuitive drag-and-drop reordering.
Facilitate academic management through course, routine, study materials, and lecture slides management.
Deliver powerful search, filtering, and notification capabilities to keep users informed and organized.
Equip administrators with real-time analytics, user and content management, and system-wide oversight capabilities.
Ensure high performance with lazy loading, client-side caching, and virtualization for handling large data efficiently.
Offer an accessible, responsive, and user-friendly interface with offline support and smooth animations.
Maintain stringent security measures including data privacy, environment variable protection, and secure backend access.
key_features: User Authentication & Profile Management with secure login, signup, password recovery, and role-based permissions.

Task Management supporting CRUD operations, categorization, status updates (In Progress, Completed, Overdue), deadlines with visual indicators, drag-and-drop reordering using @dnd-kit, and multiple viewing modes including Kanban and table views.

Academic Management encompassing class routines, course and teacher management with bulk import features, study materials uploading and organization, and lecture slides preview and management tied to specific course sections.
Announcement Management for creating and filtering announcements by sections.
Admin Dashboard providing user management with role promotion/demotion, analytics with Chart.js visualizations, system statistics, and real-time metrics.
Super Admin Capabilities including comprehensive system analytics, admin user management, audit logs, and controls over system-wide settings.
Notification System offering both push notifications via Capacitor and Firebase and in-app alerts for deadlines and announcements.
Side Navigation with responsive, collapsible menus optimized for mobile and desktop.
Search and Filtering across tasks, courses, and materials for effortless data discovery.
Performance Enhancements such as lazy loading, client-side caching, virtualized lists, and smooth UI animations with Framer Motion.
user_flow_summary: User logs in or signs up through a secure authentication process, accessing personalized dashboards based on role.
Users create, view, update, categorize, and reorder tasks using drag-and-drop; set deadlines with visual feedback and track progress statuses.
Students and educators manage academic schedules, courses, study materials, lecture slides, and receive announcements filtered by sections.
Admins access dashboards to monitor user statistics, manage user roles and content such as courses and routines; they also track analytics and system metrics.
Super Admins perform high-level administration including managing other admins, viewing audit logs, and adjusting system-wide configurations.
Notifications alert users to upcoming deadlines and announcements, delivered through push or in-app messaging, enhancing timely task completion.
Users navigate the interface via a responsive side navigation menu with tab management, optimized for all device types.
Search and filter functionalities allow users to quickly find tasks, courses, or study materials across the platform.
validation_criteria: Successful authentication flow including login, signup, password recovery, and role-based access enforcement.
All task CRUD operations functional with proper status updates, deadlines, and drag-and-drop reordering persisting correctly.
Academic management modules allow creation, editing, bulk import, and filtering with accurate data reflections.
Announcement system properly creates, edits, and filters announcements per user section.
Admin dashboard accurately displays real-time metrics, graphs, user stats, and enables user role management changes.
Super Admin features demonstrate full system audit trails, admin user management controls, and analytics accessibility.
Push and in-app notifications triggered correctly based on deadlines and announcements, received on all supported devices.
UI responsiveness and functionality maintained across mobile, tablet, and desktop, with smooth animations and offline capabilities.
Performance tests confirm lazy loading efficiencies, client-side caching effectiveness, and virtualization of large lists.
Security audits validate data privacy, environment variable protection, and secure backend access via Supabase RLS.

features.name: Admin Dashboard Overview
features.description: Main dashboard with user statistics, task analytics, user graphs, and real-time metrics display. Includes greeting time, date filters, and visual charts for data representation.

features.name: User Management System
features.description: Complete user management with list view, user stats, user activity tracking, role promotion/demotion, and user deletion capabilities. Includes section-based filtering for section admins.

features.name: Task Management (Legacy)
features.description: Legacy task management with task creation, editing, deletion, filtering, sorting, bulk operations, and multiple view modes (table/grid). Includes search and date range filtering.

features.name: Enhanced Task Management V2
features.description: Enhanced task management with Kanban board view, advanced filtering, task templates, task analytics, comments threading, and improved performance with virtualization.

features.name: Announcement Management
features.description: System for creating, editing, and managing announcements with section-based filtering. Includes announcement forms and list views.

features.name: Course Management
features.description: Comprehensive course management with CRUD operations, bulk import functionality, course-teacher associations, and section-based filtering.

features.name: Teacher Management
features.description: Teacher management system with create, update, delete operations, bulk import, and course associations. Supports section-based filtering.

features.name: Study Materials Management
features.description: System for managing study materials linked to courses, with upload, delete, and organization capabilities.

features.name: Lecture Slides Management
features.description: Lecture slides management with upload, preview, and organization features tied to specific sections.

features.name: Routine Management
features.description: Class routine/schedule management with slot creation, bulk import, activation/deactivation, and time slot management.

features.name: Super Admin Features
features.description: Super admin dashboard with system-wide analytics, admin management, admin creation, audit logs, and system statistics.

features.name: Side Navigation & UI
features.description: Collapsible side navigation with tab management, mobile support, and responsive design for admin interface.

features.name: Statistics & Analytics Components
features.description: Reusable stat cards and analytics components for displaying user, task, and system metrics.
